description: Display Just In Time Messages (JITMs) on admin pages.
author: Automattic

scripts.build: pnpm run install-if-deps-outdated && pnpm run clean && pnpm run build-js
scripts.build-production: pnpm run distclean && pnpm run install-if-deps-outdated && pnpm run build-production-js
scripts.build-production-js: NODE_ENV=production BABEL_ENV=production pnpm run build-js && pnpm run validate-es5 -- ./src/
